text: Hianagi zamagra amanage hu'za hugahaze. Ofri kasefa huno mani'nea Ra Anumzamo'a noti kaziga mopafintira Israeli vahera zamavare atiramino ne-eno, ru moparegama zamavare trege'zama kinama ome huterema hu'naregatira ete zamavare atru hugahie. Ana hanige'za ete mopazamifi emanigahaze hu'za hugahaze.
